title: A must experience to do
positive: We had a deluxe room with a balcony that looked across the marina towards the Marina Sands Hotel.  Our king bed was v comfortable and hard to get out of most days.  The room was spacious with well appointed lighting, there were power sockets with USB charging and HDMI ports.  Our USB charging outputs did not work, but we are prepared for those moments by taking a multi power box with USB charging and plenty of adaptors (UK fittings for SG).  There is only one power socket beside the bed so you need an extra long cord if you want to charge your devices from the bedside without a power socket.  There were two phones in the room if your using the work station. The real treat is the shower, 3 types to choose from, rain, spa and hand.  Hotel location is perfect with corridors to the shopping malls, MRT Promenade is a 5 min walk.  Here is the small things that need improvement, room service is too slow, it took an hour for a toasted sandwich and the order was still wrong, the trolley sat outside the room for near to 24 hrs, I took it back to reception.  You dont get any reward points unless you book direct.  My partner had strained a knee muscle and the team was amazing and caring we got all the support needed.  However sometimes you need to explore your requests a little more deeply with the right person in order to get what you reasonably need, ask to speak to someone who knows the system a bit better.  Overall it was worth every cent and we will go back.

title: excellent experience
positive: We chose Pan Pancific hotel to celebrate the Bday, very nice room environment, excellent sleeping condition. Can have meal just inside the hotel cause have several amazing restaurants, superb spa also included.

title: Very friendly staff, and spacious and clean room
positive:
Staff were extremely friendly, polite and helpful. They gave us a call in the morning to let us know our room was ready, and provided lovely birthday treats in the room. Room was spacious and clean, indoor playground was also really huge, our toddler had lots of fun there.
With the deal on B.com it was really great value for money too!!
negative:
We requested firmer pillows, which they said was available on the pillow menu, we got them 35 mins later but they felt pretty much exactly the same as the ones already in the room - probably gave the wrong one but we were too tired to call to ask. 
Room decor is a bit dated, tv could do with an upgrade with more modern apps (just some network channels, no netflix)

negative: The TV could include Apple TV to allow airplay
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: Very Good
positive:
Good location, nice view from my room's balcony
Good room size for 3 adult pax
Good bathroom with nice and quality toiletries
Good size pool with lovely cabanas to chill.
Left a tshirt in the room and the housekeeper handed it over to their concierge. It was very easy to liaise with them to get the tshirt back.
negative:
Long queue during check in. Eventually opened other counters and directed guests accordingly. Could have been done earlier. My room was not ready until quite late. I asked for a late check out and they dutifully fulfilled my request.
Stop providing complimentary single used plastic bottles. There are other environmentally friendly way to provide drinking water in the rooms.
Complimentary parking should not be limited to one per day.

negative: 없음.

title: 思ってたよりとても快適なホテル
positive: これまでに、シンガポールでは、シャングリラ、リッツカールトン、マンダリンオリエンタルに宿泊しています。シャングリラ以外は、クラブアクセス付きの部屋を選び、それぞれとても快適でした。でも、今回のパンパシフィックシンガポールでは、スタッフの温かい対応にとても助けられました。パシフィッククラブのお部屋に宿泊しましたが、おそらくその中では一番お得なお部屋を選んでいましたが、パシフィッククラブのすぐ下の35階にしてくれました。初めての一人旅でしたが、とても快適に安心して過ごせました。到着後のレセプションのスタッフが、皆さんとてもおもてなし感を持っている対応をしてくれました。特に、日本人スタッフのAさん、お名前を覚えられなかったけど、ランチの時間が過ぎても、絵本を売っているお店を探してくれた、同じくAから始まるお名前の若い女性スタッフ、入口のベルボーイスタッフ、プール入口のスタッフ、とてもとても優しくフレンドリーに、そして親身に接していただけて、ぜひまた宿泊したいと思いました。正直、これまではリッツカールトンが一番だと思ってましたが、パンパシフィックシンガポールの大ファンになりました。朝食がレストランもクラブラウンジも利用できたのも良かったです。お部屋の冷蔵庫のアルコール以外のソフトドリンク、スナックが全部無料だったことも良かったです。パシフィッククラブラウンジのシャンパンがテタンジェとローランペリエだったのが最高でした。
negative: パシフィッククラブでなかなかオーダーを取りに来なかったことです。360度展望のフロアーで目が行き届かなかったのでしょうか、それとも英語が堪能でない私に近づきにくかったのでしょうか、カクテルアワー、朝食、アフタヌーンティーと三度行きましたが、全て自分でドリンクをオーダーしに行きました。クラブラウンジでは、着席したらまずドリンクだと思っている私には、あまり快適な場所ではありませんでした。女性スタッフの方はお代わりなど何度も聞きには来てくれましたが、スーツを着た男性スタッフの動きがもう少し気配りがあっても良かったと思います。その点は他のホテルより劣っていたところだと思います。次は、ラウンジアクセス付きのお部屋でなくてもいいなと思いました。

title: Zakenreis met vakantie gevoel
positive: Locatie, ontbijt en kamers zijn top

title: トータルでいうととても良かった。シンガポールに行く時は次も泊まりたい。
positive:
朝食のビュッフェが美味しかった。たくさん種類があって楽しめました。
ロケーションはとにかく最高。日本人スタッフの方が常駐しているので安心感あり。
SPAを利用したけど、とても良かった。また受けたい。
negative:
お部屋の見晴らしがマリーナベイサンズと逆だったのが残念。
カーテンを触ったらすごいベタついてて気持ち悪かった。カーテンも掃除してほしい。
施設が古いのだろうけど、もう少し掃除を綺麗にしてほしい。
スリッパとガウンはあったけれど、いかにも洗濯機で洗った感じでヨレヨレ＆スリッパは汚れが落ちきってない感じで気持ち悪くて使えなかった。

title: リーズナブルでいてリッチ
positive:
マリーナ地区にあり、どこに行くにも便利
マーライオン公園とマリーナベイサンズ、シンガポールスクエアがベランダから見えてこの値段は、周辺のホテルに比べて、リッチ感維持しながらお得
マリーナスクエアに二階の通路から行けるので、朝食はそちらにした
マリーナベイサンズのスペクトラムショーを見てから歩いて帰れた。
日本語の話せるスタッフも複数いて、フロントでこちらが不安そうな表情をすると、直ぐにインカムで呼んでくれた。
negative: 三人で宿泊のため、エキストラベッドが用意されていたまではいいが、アメニティが２人分しか用意されてなかった。電話して直ぐに対応してもらい解決。
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: 浴室的水赞👌清扫有待改进🤨
positive:
1.浴室的水非常不错👌，而且有三个花洒🚿非常方便。
2.有提供瓶装水。
3.元旦还有马卡龙甜点🍮，很贴心。
4.电视不错。电动窗帘也不错。
negative:
清扫有待改进！虽然是可忍耐范围，但有减分。
1.放在桌子上的小剪子✂️，莫名其妙损坏....
2.没有提供梳子
3.最后一天没有给浴帽
4.拖鞋没有再提供，一直穿第一天的拖鞋
5.铺床一般般。床上的睡衣被随手一放（隔壁某酒店住的时候是被叠起来的，当然这个因人而异，不算减分。）
此外，隔音略差。空调声较大。房间好像没有免打扰的设定。
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: 最悪。一泊５万円の価値無し！

title: Good
positive: frokost ok, litt kø -
negative: raskere utsjekk, informere at veiene rundt hotellet var stengt for løpe stevne. vi som da kom i bil kom ikke frem til hotellet. GRRRRRRR. hotellet var informert om at vi kom med bil.....

title: Disappointing
positive:
- Ausblick Clubzimmer 35. Stock 
- Frühstücksauswahl im Edge riesig
- Lage ist perfekt innerhalb der Marina Bay
- Sufian und Sonia an der Bar sind wirklich sehr sehr zuvorkommend und konnten sich beim 2. Besuch schon an unsere Getränkewahl erinnern
negative:
Das Personal ist weder proaktiv noch denkt es mit, noch gibt es Abstimmungen zwischen den div. Departments. 
Unser Aufenthalt erstreckte sich über 9 Tage, durch 2 aufeinanderfolgende Buchungen via Booking.com. In diesen 9 Tagen waren wir 10 mal an der Rezeption/Concierge um darum zu bitten (manchmal 2 mal pro Tag) das unsere Minibar aufgefüllt wird (welche im Clublevel inkl. ist). Sowas nervt schon beim 3 Mal, aber 10 Mal....
Desweiteren fragt man sich oft, wofür genau an manchen Einrichtungen Personal stationiert wird, wie z.B. im Fitnesscenter. Hier stehen 2 Mitarbeiter die sich miteinander unterhalten. Es gibt keine Einführung in die Geräte für Gäste oder sont irgend etwas was man als Service am Gast bezeichnen könnte (Getränke oder Handtücher könnten evt. gerreicht werden!?). Nach 5 Minuten im Fitnesscenter sind die 2 Herren dann auch rausgegangen um ihren Smalltalk mit dem Poolpersonal zu vertiefen und nach 15 Minuten war von den 3 Mitarbeitern weit und breit nichts mehr zu sehen für die nächste Stunde. Ich möchte auch den General Manager herzlich einladen, doch mal auf seinen Poolliegen, ganz besonders den Cabanas, Platz zu nehmen. Diese Auflagen sind SOOOOOO durchgelegen, das man bequemer auf dem puren Beton liegt. Allgemein könnten vorallem die Zimmer ein Facelift gebrauchen, das Mobiliar ist in die Jahre gekommen.

title: Ok
positive: + personal, Lage, frühstück
negative:
- sehr feucht auch in den zimmern, teppichboden, kein entfeuchter im bad,
Preis leistungsverhältnis stimmte nicht für ein 5stern hotel
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: Fair
positive: ベイエリアまで近く、また空港間のタクシー移動では、混雑を避けることができてよかった
negative: 5年前のときは、とても綺麗で快適だった。今回の部屋は所々カビていたり、部屋全体が湿気ていたりと、非常に残念だった。これはホテルのルールかもしれないが、シャンプー、ボディソープが常備されておらず、オーダーする必要があった。
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: Fair
negative: Берут депозит за всё. Потом конечно возвращается, но готовьтесь к резерву 400$ на вашей карте за минибар. Чтобы холодильник вычистили 1000₽, которые уже не вернутся. При том, что вы уже оплатили 10 процентов стоимости номера за обслуживание. Худшие 5 звезд.

title: Okay
negative: 部屋指定したが景色が思ったほど良くなかった。
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: Pleasant
positive: Das Hotel ist insgesamt sehr gut, sowohl bezüglich Ausstattung, Lage als auch Sauberkeit. Das darf man bei dem Preis aber auch erwarten.
negative: Zunächst: Wir sind etwas eher angekommen als geplant. Nachdem die Dame am Empfang uns für 240Dollar Aufpreis pro Nacht ein "höherwertigeres Apartment", das wir sofort beziehen könnten, angeboten und ich das abgelehnt habe wurden wir zweimal für je 2 Stunden wieder weggeschickt, um nach einer jeweils wieder minutenlangen Prozedur zu erfahren, dass es noch dauert und wieder gehen zu dürfen. Bei einem gefühlt schwach ausgelasteten Hotel mit geschätzt mehr als 500 Zimmern eine völlig unangebrachte oder absichtliche Unflexibilität.
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: Good
positive:
조식이 식당이 넓고 음식종류가 많아서 먹을만했습니다.
근데 아이가 먹기에는 향식료 들어간 음식과 닭고기 종류만 많아서 좀 힘들어하더라고요.
일식류가 좀 더 있었으면 더 괜츈했을듯.
그 외 서비스도 최상 풀장도 그만하면 붐비지 않고 잘 이용했고요 아늑하니 좋았습니다.
로비 역시 고급스러워서 분위기좋았고요 
위치 또한 최상 룸에서 바라보는 뷰가 끝내줬어요.
negative:
오자마자 느낀게 여기는 룸빼고는 다 좋네 였습니다.
들어가자마자 락스냄새 비슷하게 나서 적응하는데 고생했고요 침구가 축축하고 전반적으로 룸 컨디션이 좀 별로 였어요
오래되고 룸욕실 할것없이 디테일이 깨끗하지가 않더라고요.
다른건 다 만족했으나 룸컨디션 중요하게 생각하는 우리가족은 재방문은 안할듯...
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

浴槽とシャワールームを別にするならそれぞれがちゃんと排水出来て、洗面台前で裸足でも足が濡れないような設備にしないと不便。

negative: 空调系统有问题，最后一晚空调无法手动设置，忽冷忽热。一些设施比较陈旧。给服务台打电话后，反应很慢。价格太高，性价比不高。

title: チェックイン以外はとても良かった(^^)
positive: ロケーションとても良い、朝ごはんも美味しい。クラブラウンジのアフターヌーンティはクラブルーム予約で無料とは思えない質と量でした。部屋、ラウンジからの景色は、共に最高でした。プールもいい感じ。コンシェルジュはお願いすればレストランの予約もしっかりしてくれました。
negative:
チェックイン当日、早めに行ったら部屋の準備ができておらず、クラブラウンジでアフターヌーンティで時間を潰しましたが、18時を過ぎても部屋を案内されず、情報のアップデートもなく、仕方なくチェックインせずに夜ご飯へ。帰ってきて20時にはさすがに部屋に案内されたが、部屋の準備ができたら電話かメールをするとのことだったが、それらはなく。
それをレセプションで言ったところ、レイトチェックアウト16時、部屋には高級チョコレート(クラブルームに付いていたのかもしれないが。)、50ドルのバウチャーをいただきました。
シンガポール着いて、疲れたところすぐにチェックイン出来なかったのは少し残念でした。

title: Disappointing
positive:
Frühstück war sehr umfangreich, aber nicht besonderes. In diesem Preissegment eher durchnittlich.
Lage sehr gut
negative:
Sauberkeit der Zimmer war unterirdisch.
Housekeeping extrem unfreundlich, zum Teil sogar aufmüpfig. Als ich versuchte auf verschiedene Dinge einzugehen, wurde sie sogar laut und hat mich angemekert.
In-Roomdining sehr wenig Auswahl und lange Wartezeiten. Dann auch noch falsch geliefert.
Wir haben mehrfach gebeten, die Betten frisch zu beziehen, da die Bettwäsche schmutzig und voller Löcher war, leider nicht möglich. Bei 7 Tagen keine frische Bettwäsche trotz Nachfragen.
Das Housekeeping hat uns 2x morgens um 8.00 Uhr geweckt um zu fragen, ob das Zimmer jetzt gemacht werden könnte.
Wir haben das Hotel 2x früh morgens verlassen und gefragt, ob es möglich wäre, das Zimmer vor 15 Uhr zu reinigen. War nicht möglich!!!
Wir hatten etwas zu feiern und wollten etwas Eis haben zu Anstoßen. Ich mussten 3x Fragen, nach 45 Minuten habe ich es selbst am der Bar geholt.
Trotz mehreren Gesprächen mit dem Staff wurde nichts besser, keinerlei Wille zur Verbeserung erkennbar. 
Beim Checkout wurden wir nich einmal gefragt, wie unser Aufenthalt war, was das Fass für mich persönlich zum überlaufen brachte, aber selbst in diesem Moment war es nicht möglich einen Manager zu sprechen.

title: Singapore ist eine sehr spezielle, faszinierende Stadt mit zum Teil fantastischer Architektur.
positive:
Die Aussicht auf die Marina Bay war einfach fantastisch! Die Wege zu den Sehenswürdigkeiten nicht zu weit. Alles war gut erreichbar. Die Taxis waren ausgesprochen günstig. Trotz der vielen Menschen auf kleinstem Raum gab es nirgends unangenehme Ansammlungen oder grosses Gedränge. Alles scheint super organisiert.
Die vielgerühmten Toiletten waren aber leider auch nicht sauberer als in anderen Grosstädten.

title: Exceptional
positive: Sehr schönes Hotel mit Stil und aufmerksamem Personal.

title: Дорого, но оно того стОит!
positive: Шикарное местоположение для всего: в 200м вход в метро, вплотную примыкают 2 больших торговых центра  (где кстати вы можете позавтракать в 2 раза дешевле чем в отеле). Пешком 10-15 до главных центральных туристических достопримечательностей. Все номера просторные, даже самый недорогой. Шторы блэк-аут, окна от пола. Стандартные универсальные розетки. Персонал - отличный!
negative: В номере кофе-машина, но капсулы на нее не продаются. Можно просить на ресепшн. Если не просить - дают 3 разных капсулы в день. Завтрак за отдельную плату - ужас!!! Либо берите включено "шведский стол", либо на фуд-корт рядом - там с 08.00 на любой вкус, от круассанов до азиатской еды. В ТВ нет русских каналов. Туристов много, но карты достопримечательностей отсутствуют. Доступ на этажи только по карте - если вы живете на 24 этаже, то на последний этаж (посмотреть панораму) и в клуб наверху вас не пустят. Ну что за чушь, а?! Можно подумать на этажах ниже отель не 5 звезд, а 3. Тем более что желающий попасть наверх может просто прокатиться с кем-то живущим выше ;-) А, вот еще: английский у персонала не у всех. А у тех, кто хоть что-то может сказать, он с таким акцентом... Приходилось даже на ресепшн переспрашивать по несколько раз.

title: Exceptional
positive: Ausgezeichnetes High-End Hotel mit perfektem Service. Hervorragende Lage in der City

title: Super
positive: Zeer netjes en schoon. En zeer mooi voor de ogen

title: Exceptional
positive: Besonders gut gefallen hat uns, das wir unser Zimmer bereits um kurz nach 09 Uhr bekommen haben, anstatt wie üblich erst ab 15 Uhr😀
negative: Es hat uns alles gefallen, es war für uns ein perfekter Start in unseren Urlaub.😀

title: Ein wirklich sehr angenehmes Stadthotel, hervorragend geeignet als Ausgangspunkt zur Erkundung
positive:
Das Pan Pacific ist vom Flughafen Changi per Taxi gut erreichbar. Dank Anbindung an eine der zahlreichen Malls kann man nicht nur gut bummeln und shoppen, sondern auch die einheimische Küche testen.
Fussläufig ist das Gebiet Bayfront und auch das Raffles erreichbar. Von einigen Zimmern hat man auch einen tollen Blick auf das Marina Bay Sands und das Riesenrad.
Die Lounge mit Blick auf den Singapore Flyer und das MBS ist hervorragend. Kurz nach der TeaTime werden schon Cocktails und andere PremiumGetränke serviert, außerdem gibt es ein kleines Büffet.  Service sehr gut!
Trüffelomelett und Champagner zum Frühstück - der Tag kann nicht besser beginnen.
Der Pool ist gepflegt und es gibt viele Liegen.
Sehr gute Boxspring Betten.
Schnelles W-LAN.
negative:
Trotz der Lage auf der 33. Etage hörten wir den Strassenverkehr .
Das Zimmer ist vom Mobiliar her etwas altmodisch in dunklen Tönen gehalten, aber gepflegt.

title: Exceptional
positive:
Centraal gelegen bij verschillende metrostations. 
In de buurt bij Marina bay en Gardens by the Bay.

title: Ottimo
positive: Struttura assolutamente in centro! Visibile anche dal Marina Bay, dove abbiamo trascorso la notte successiva. Hotel molto curato e accogliente. Camera assolutamente spaziosa e luminosa con una caratteristica eccezionale per noi italiani, a mio parere ovvero la macchinetta del caffè nespresso, presente in camera con tanto di ben 3 cialde, per due persone, dopo 20 giorni fuori casa, un caffè come si deve, ci ha fatto davvero molto piacere. Inoltre al nostro rientro in camera abbiamo trovato ad attenderci 2 dragon fruit e 2 tortini dolci ripieni all’ananas! Molto scenografici anche gli ascensori esterni ed interni. Personale davvero molto cortese e attento in tutto! Mi sento di consigliarlo
negative: Direi nulla

title: 満足。でもサービス面では残念。
positive: 設備、ロケーションともとても良いです。マリーナ側のバルコニー付きの部屋に宿泊しましたが、バルコニーからの眺めもとても素晴らしかったです。
negative: シンガポールマラソンに参加する為に宿泊しました。ロケーションはスタート、ゴール地点に近く、とても便利でした。一点、事前に、レース前に休養を取る為、可能であれば規定のチェックイン時間より少し早く部屋に入らせて欲しい旨リクエストし、当日レセプションでもそのように伝え、連絡先を伝えて4階のラウンジで連絡を待っていましたが、結局通常のチェックイン時間である15時になっても何の連絡もなく、自分で再度レセプションに下りて行って、チェックインしました。連絡がなかったことに対する謝罪は一言もありませんでした（謝罪の代わりに眺めの良い部屋を割当てくれたのかもしれません）。当日はレセプションも混雑しており、多少の混乱があったのかもしれませんが、残念でした。
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: Pan Pacific terrific !

Propreté, calme et personnel très sympas.
Option Pacific Club équivaut à une super demi-pension avec cocktails premier choix et autres boissons à volonté et buffet à thème différent chaque jour de 18h00 à 20h00. A recommander vivement et pour un rapport qualité / prix imbattable.
Garde bagage le jour du départ avec accès piscine et douche avant d’aller à l’aéroport. Parfait !

title: 立地重視でコスパの良いホテル
positive: ロケーションが良い。サンテックシティは徒歩圏内。空港からのタクシー移動は夕方着でも渋滞に巻き込まれず快適。大きなバスタブは快適。簡易ウォシュレットあり。部屋に用意されるお茶はTWG。建物自体は古いがリノベーションで綺麗に保たれているので快適。
negative: 部屋を出た時に毎回部屋のマスター電源が切れる仕様になっているようで、出かけて部屋に戻ってから涼しくなるまで時間が必要だった。ミニバーの飲み物は場所移動できない仕様（所定の位置から缶を移動すると60秒で課金されると注意書きあり）なので、買ってきた物を冷やすスペースが狭い。エレベーターが遅い。シングルベッドの幅が狭い。（ツインよりキングが良いかと）

title: 大変綺麗なホテルでした
positive:
フロントの方の対応丁寧でした。片言の英語でも通じてなに不自由なく過ごせました。日本人スタッフもいらして安心でした。
部屋も清潔。連泊でしたのでチップをおきておきましたが丁寧にお礼のメッセージを書いてくれていました。
ロビーのラウンジが大変オシャレ。優雅にティータイムでゆっくりするのに向いています。
部屋は低層階でしたがマリーナベイサンズなどがベランダから見られて眺めもそこそこ良かったです。
地下鉄の駅から直ぐでどこに行くにも便利な立地です。
JTBのカウンターもホテル2階に入っており、ちょっとした質問も対応してもらえました。地下鉄の乗り方など。
negative: 無し

positive: Tolle Zimmer super Aussicht ind gute Lage

title: クラブにしていなければとても満足でした。
positive: クラブルームでロケーションはとても良かったし地下鉄へのアクセスもとてもいい。しかし、クラブアクセスできるラウンジはかなり期待外れ。朝食も数が少ないし、スタッフが中々来てくれない。シャンパンブレックファストなのにシャンパンいかがですか？とも聞かれないし、あれならもうクラブルームじゃなくただの眺望のいい部屋で十分だと思った。
negative: クラブアクセスできるラウンジはかなり期待外れ。朝食も数が少ないし、混んでるわけでもないのにスタッフが中々来てくれない。シャンパンブレックファストなのにシャンパンいかがですか？とも聞かれないし、あれならもうクラブルームじゃなくただの眺望のいい部屋で十分だと思った。1日しか行きませんでした。

title: すべてが素晴らしい！
positive:
シティービューも良いですが、特にマリーナベイに面した部屋からの眺めは最高です。
海天楼の中華料理は素晴らしいですし、edgeでの朝食は世界でもトップレベルでしょう。
なによりスタッフの親しみのこもった笑顔と親切な対応にほっとします。
クラブフロアに滞在であれば、最上階のクラブラウンジのあまりの心地良さにホテルでずっと過ごしたくなるのではないでしょうか。

title: Exceptional
positive: 位置超棒，离滨海湾很近

title: Good
positive: 地理位置和风景比较好，酒店设施也不错。
negative: 我们虽然定的是俱乐部房型，但是房间较小，格局颇为紧凑。较多的行李摆放会比较吃力。

title: Exceptional
positive: Шикарный отель, замечательный и разнообразный завтрак, уютный и чистый номер,  личный балкон с потрясающим видом на залив и возможностью покурить. Очень красивый лобби и бар, где всегда можно отдохнуть, вкусно поесть и выпить качественные коктейли. Приятная, романтическая атмосфера, замечательный сервис, особенно отмечен был консьерж-всегда с удовольствием поможет во всех вопросах. Все просто супер!
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

Très bon petit déjeuner

title: Boa localização.
positive: Localização excelente. Proximidade dos principais pontos de interesse.
negative: Reservei quarto com varanda e camas de solteiro e no momento do check-in não tinha disponibilidade. Fizeram um upgrade, mas com sofá cama muito desconfortável. Precisei trocar de quarto para conseguir dormir. Por fim, me colocaram num quarto com duas camas, mas sem varanda.
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: Exceptional
positive: Einfach alles kann man nur weiter empfehlen.

title: Exceptional
positive:
预订时试着给酒店发了一封邮件，告知本次出行是孩子的生日旅行，很快就收到回复，说会提供一些special treatments，入住后发现桌子上有一块精致的蛋糕和一张生日卡片，孩子很开心，也感受到酒店的周到热情。
房间很大，阳台上能看到金沙酒店和鱼尾狮。床很舒服，每天睡的好踏实。房间位置尚可，步行到滨海湾、摩天轮，都可以接受。周边有滨海广场和新达城，美食购物都可以，酒店二楼有廊桥直通，不用出一楼大门就可以去到商场内部。
negative: 床和马桶稍微有点高，对于四岁的娃来说爬上去稍微有点费劲。酒店及周边交通稍微有些复杂，早上想去新达城的大食代吃早餐，绕了好久才找到。泳池要是能多一些儿童戏水设施就好了

title: Exceptional
negative: Все на высшем уровне!!!!

title: Wonderful
positive: 早餐非常好，品质高品种多。酒店位置不错
negative: 酒店房间稍微小了一点，行政酒廊提供的品种相对少了一些

title: Tolles Hotel für City-Trip
positive: Super Lage, sehr zentral zu umliegenden Sehenswürdigkeiten und einer Metrostation. Das Hotelpersonal ist sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend, die Zimmer mit Balkon sind groß und sauber. Wir hatten direkten Blick auf die Marina Bay, was sehr schön war.
negative: Das Frühstück ist für den Preis für uns nichts gewesen. Lag aber auch daran, dass wir morgens keine Suppen und Nudelgerichte mögen. Alternativ gibt es für weniger als die Hälfte im Marketplace auch Croissants und Kaffee.

title: Hotel do którego można wracać .........

title: Super Lage, super Frühstück, sehr zuvorkommendes Personal.
positive:
Der Clubraum im 38. Stock war sehr schön, so wohl das Ambiente, als auch die Auswahl der Speisen (Frühstück, Tee, Cocktail). Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. 
Die Auswahl des Frühstücks im 3. Stock war unglaublich, für unseren Geschmack aber schon fast zu viel und etwas zu weitläufig.
negative: Nichts, wir haben in unseren 4 Tagen nichts vermisst.

title: 位置好房间大适合带孩子住
positive:
地理位置非常好，就在滨海湾市中心，安静干净。
安排了非常棒海景房间，透过窗户就能看见金沙酒店和鱼尾狮。步行就能到鱼尾狮，金沙酒店，摩天轮。
还和一个商场连着，外面就有很多好吃的。早餐就没啥必要在酒店吃了，太贵，前台提前一天买是38一位，餐厅当天买是48一位。
浴室特别干净，下水也很通畅。带孩子是完全没有问题的。房间的面积也足够大。
建议带6岁以下孩子的家庭就住这里就行。
negative:
1.订了大床房，但是给的房间确是连个单人床拼接的，中间有道缝，孩子睡在上面估计不舒服。
2.房间里没有孩子的牙刷毛巾拖鞋枕头，对儿童不友好。

初日に、ミニタオルがセットされていなかった。

title: Очень удобный и красивый отель
positive: Отель удобно расположен неподалеку от залива и основных достопримечательностей, рядом с ним несколько торговых центров. по которым легко перемещаться в комфортной температуре, рестораны и станция метро. Интересна архитектура отеля, в нём есть небольшой но удобный бассейн, несколько зеленых уголков, а также тренажерный зал и несколько хорошо оформленных ресторанов и баров. Мы не брали завтрак, показалось дорого, но были неправы: это не так уж дорого для Сингапура. учитывая качество еды. Персонал очень приветлив и отзывчив. И постоянно приятное чувство, что всё здесь устроено хорошо. правильно и удобно...
negative: Но дорого, увы.  А в новогодние праздничные дни цена еще стремительно взлетала...

title: Супер план
positive:
Прилетели утром, добрались быстро. Сначала планировалась бюджетная ночь перед круизом, по возвращении - видовой номер, но предложили сразу улучшить -согласились и не пожалели, для эффекта ВАУ сразу вид на Марину Бей и всё всё. Можно было заселиться за доплату сразу, не стали: прекрасно освежились в бассейне и отправились гулять. Очень комфортные раздевалки у бассейна со всем необходимым. Номер просторный, кровать гигантская, есть кофемашина. Завтрак хороший, но как оказалось через 5 дней поднадоел. Бассейн неглубокий, небольшой, но очень кстати до и после прогулок. действительно все рядом.. Часть вещей без проблем оставили в камере хранения до возвращения из круиза. 
Думаю, если случиться быть в Сингапуре- снова выберу этот Отель.
negative: Несущественные мелочи

title: Dieses Hotel ist eine tolle Wahl gewesen.
positive:
Eines der besten Frühstücksbuffets, die wir je in einem Hotel hatten. Sehr vielfältige Speisen für Gäste vieler Kulturkreise. 
Personal ausserordentlich freundlich, ob an der Rezeption oder im Zimmerservice. Die Aussicht vom Balkon und Zimmer aus in Richtung Marina Bay ist atemberaubend.
Wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt.

title: Exceptional
positive:
Super Lage, gutes Ambiente, schöne Zimmer, sehr ruhig.
Man konnte nach dem Auschecken noch an den Pool und hatte einen sehr gut ausgestatteten Changing Room! Das war sehr angenehm, da wir erst nachts geflogen sind.
negative: Unsere Ankunft war um 6 Uhr! ( angekündigt).Es hieß wir dürfen erst um 15 Uhr in unsere Zimmer. Da wir todmüde waren fragten wir, ob wir gegen Aufpreis nicht früher reinkönnten. Da ging es plötzlicheren einen Aufpreis von 200€ !!!!!!!! Für ein Zimmer, das ursprünglich sowieso schon 250€ gekostet hat! Das fanden wir unverschämt, haben es aber trotzdem gemacht, um den Tag besser zu überstehen.

title: Отличный отель для остановки в Сингапуре.
positive: Все просто супер: вежливый персонал, отреагировали на ранний приезд - заселили в 9 утра. Расположен замечательно, из номера студио на 31 этаже открывается отличный вид на Марину бэй. Чистота, великолепный сервис, в целом рекомендую данный отель.
negative: Можно немножко придраться к завтраку. Представлено много кухонь: европейская, индийская, восточная, но в рамках каждой кухни выбор достаточно обычный. Как уже сказал - это придирки. Все было достаточно вкусно.

title: Отличное расположение
positive:
Расположение очень удобное, все рядом.
Тренажёрный зал, хорошо оборудован, бассейн.
Отличные виды из окон на верхних этажах.
negative:
Изначально забронировали комнату 46м2. По факту метров 8 это балкон. В итоге 2 взрослым и ребёнку было мало места (это для нас). Пришлось делать апгрэйт проживания до номера с гостиной 79 м2. Рекомендую бронировать его, если не проживаете в двоем или ребёнок спит с вами.
Очень дорогие завтраки, мы не брали. Рядом три торговых комплекса с выходом прямо из отеля, там море вариантов по еде)

title: Como deben ser todos los hoteles! Espectacular!

negative: Me gustó todo.

title: Bestens weiter zu empfehlen.....
positive:
Modernes Stadthotel in Singapur mit sehr gutem Anschluss zur Mall, Marina Bay und City. 
Sehr freundliches professionell geführtes Hotel.
Wir hatten ein Upgrade mit atemberaubender Aussicht auf das Hotel "Marina Bay Sand" bekommen. 
Umfangreiches Frühstücksbuffet.
Wegen unseren zurückgelassenen Jacken war der Kontakt zum Housekeeping hervorragend.
Wir kommen gerne wieder...
negative: Der Kaffeeservice im Restaurant hätte präsenter vor Ort sein können.

title: またぜひ宿泊したい！本当に素晴らしいホテル！！！
positive:
部屋からの景色、エレベーターの景色ともに素晴らしかった。
部屋の内装もとてもスタイリッシュ。
クラブフロアの食事、ワイン、スタッフ、ローケーション全て素晴らしかった！
アプリによる、コンシェルジュサービスもとても便利だった。
そしてロビーがとても素敵なデザインで、とてもセンスがいいです。
negative:
シャワーブースの水がどうしてもバスルームに漏れてしまう構造だったので少し大変だった。
ミニバーが動かすと課金されてしまうシステムなのが、微妙だった。
クラブフロアでお水とコーラは自由に飲んでいいとのことだったが、最後のチェックアウトで料金にはいってしまっていた。また、サインするまえにミニバーの利用を聞かれたり詳細をみせてもらえず、サインしたあとの印刷された明細できづいた。事情を話して、再度決済してもらえたが、、、私ももっと明細を見せてもらうよう言うべきだったがスタッフによってそのあたりの細やかさが違っていた（隣のゲストはミニバーの利用を細かく聞かれていた）

title: Excellent
positive: Gute Lage, sehr freundliches Personal, schöner Lobbybereich, grosses Zimmer

Die Sauberkeit war dem Sterneniveau nicht angemessen.

title: Dyrt men väl värt pengarna.
positive: Utmärkt frukost med allt man kan tänka sig, kostar dock ca SEK 400:-  (svårt att "äta upp" pengarna). Det bästa var dock att vi fick tillgång till en lounge (efter utcheckning) fram till kl. 22.00 där man kunde förvara väskor, duscha och vila innan vi åkte till flygplatsen. Värt hur mycket som helst då alternativet var att köpa en natt till. Utmärkt läge nära MRT.

title: パンパシフィック シンガポールに宿泊して
positive:
マリーナスクエア、ミレニアウォーク、サンテックシティと、複数のショッピングモールにほぼ直結で、食事や買い物など困ることはありませんでした。
また、シンガポール到着が朝7時だったので、荷物だけホテルに預けて出かけようと考えていたのですが、空きがあるとのことでアーリーチェックインしていただけました。運が良かっただけなのかもしれませんが、とてもありがたかったです。
negative:
シンガポールにはたくさん宿泊施設があり、さらに安いホテルの値段を見てしまうと少し割高感はあります。
部屋の広さやロケーション、星の数などを考慮すると、高すぎるわけではありません。

title: Exceptional

title: Wonderful
positive:
Todo PERFECTO. Personal increíblemente atento y eficiente.  Piscina genial. Habitación grande y cómoda. Cama genial y extra grande.
Nos dieron late check out gratis (salida a las 14 h en vez de a las 12 h) y luego tienen un lounge disponible con duchas junto a la piscina que se puede usar gratis tras el check out. Muy práctico y cómodo para salidas de avión a media noche como la nuestra. 
Wifi muy buena. 
Ubicación EXCEPCIONAL
negative: Lógicamente no se ve el Marina sands desde todas las habitaciones pero pensaba que habría un bar o restaurante en las plantas superiores de acceso libre para poder verlo; pero las plantas superiores (de la 22 a la 38) estaban reservadas para clientes miembros.

title: Unbedingte Empfehlung - Clubzugang ist TOP

Zudem ist Frühstück sowie ab 18 Uhr (zeitlich beschränkt) ein Abendbuffet mit Getränken (Weine, Cocktails usw. ) im Preis enthalten. Für uns war das Buffet als Abendessen völlig ausreichend. Das Personal war sehr nett und aufmerksam!

title: 気持ちのいいホテルです
positive: NZからの旅行の帰りに2泊したのですが、アジア的なキメの細やかさの効いたホテルでした。今回は奮発してパシフィッククラブの方を取りましたが、金額に見合った（と言うか、それ以上かも）サービスでした。ラウンジが使えたのですが、朝食だけはメニューが充実している3階のedgeに行きました。ランドリーサービスも使って、帰ってからの洗濯を少しだけ楽にさせてもらいました。シンガポールの街の観光は私にはそれほど合わなかったので、ホテルライフを楽しめて良かったです。
negative: 浴槽にお湯を貯めているからかシャワーの水圧が低めで温度も上がらず少し寒かった。

title: Pan Pacific Singapore
positive: El hotel Pan Pacific de Singapur es un súper hotel. Está al lado de varios centro comerciales y hawkers. Las habitaciones tienen unas vistas a la bahía increíbles y todo estaba súper limpio. La atención es totalmente personalizada y el desayuno estaba buenísimo, había gran diversidad y muchas opciones, tanto para occidentales como desayunos mas exóticos. Las opciones vegetarianas estaban también contempladas. De todos modos, es un hotel muy grande así que hay zonas un poco más abarrotadas. Además empezaba el nuevo año chino así que es comprensible. Su precio es un poco elevado pero las vistas son inmejorables y la ocasión lo merecía.

title: Super
positive: Super ontbijt

title: Der Aufenthalt war super schön. Auch wenn das Hotel nicht ganz preiswert ist. Lohnte es sich für uns
positive: Trotz unserer frühen Ankunft konnten wir gleich das Zimmer beziehen Wir hatten ein Club Zimmer mit Aussicht auf das Meer und den Hafen. Die Aussicht war sensationell. Die Cocktail Stunde am Abend war sehr schön und man wurde sehr gut bewirtet. Leckeres Essen und sehtr gute Drinks.
negative: Auf der Buchungsseite von Booking.com konnte man nicht eindeutig erkennen was für eine Zimmer Kategorie man buchen mußte um den Blick auf den Hafen und das Marina Bay Sands zu bekommen.

title: Отличный современный отель
positive:
Очень хорошее расположение в центре города, рядом с Метро, с центральной остановкой Big Bus- 4 линии экскурсионных автобусов - можно посмотреть весь город.
Клубный номер - великолепный завтрак и послеобеденный чай и коктейль в клубном лаундже

ロールカーテンはありましたが、気を使うかもしれません。

title: Muy bien ubicado
positive:
Lo que más nos gusto fue la ubicación y las vistas desde el cuarto, nos quedamos en un “estudio puerto” las vistas hacia la bahía increíbles, las instalaciones del hotel bien pero la sentimos un poco viejito...pero muy cómodo. 
Está conectado a 3 centros comerciales, muchísimos restaurantes cerca, opciones de transporte etc.
El personal siempre muy amable, recomendado.
negative: Todo muy bien, el hotel en algunos detalles de siente un poco viejo pero nada que no se pueda soportar. En relación calidad/ precio fue la mejor opción que encontramos en Singapur.

title: Wonderful
positive: Das Zimmer Harbour Club war perfekt, tolle Aussicht von 31. Etage, perfekte Lage des Hotels. Das Zimmer hatte Espresso Kaffeemaschine, einen Schreibtisch, sehr schöne Beleuchtung , Fernbedienung für die Vorhänge.

title: 立地も良くて便利
positive: 駅からすぐで立地が良い。マリーナベイサンズやマーライオン付近も近くて観光しやすく、ショッピングモールともつながっており非常に便利。スタッフ方も皆さん笑顔で丁寧な対応で居心地が良い。
negative: 部屋のミニバーの中が飲み物で汚れていた。ですが、フロントに連絡すると、すぐに日本語対応できるスタッフの方が来てくれて対応してくれたので、その他は快適に過ごさせていただきました。

Personalen i baren var också något extra, alltid trevliga och hjälpsamma. Och naturligtvis en utmärkt service.
negative: Jag har faktiskt inte något att säga här, allt var bra.

title: Exceptional

Wir können sagen, dass uns alles uneingeschränkt gefallen hat. Es gibt direkt im Hotel einen tollen Conciergeservice mit ausgesprochen guten Tipps rund um Singapur. 
Direkte Ubahnstation, vieles fußläufig erreichbar.

room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: 彼女の誕生日に宿泊
positive:
彼女の誕生日にハーバービューの部屋を予約しました。部屋からはマリーナベイサンズ、ガーデンズはじめ、フラートンホテル、シンガポールフライヤー等が一望でき最高の眺めでした。
また彼女の誕生日と伝えたところ、特別なギフトも用意して頂きました。ありがとうございました。
スタッフの方々も大変親切でとても快適な滞在になりました。

title: Exceptional
positive: Хорошая гостиница с удобным расположением и доброжелательным персоналом.

title: Magnifique

title: Exceptional

title: Отличная остановка!
positive:
Обязательно нужно брать номера с видом на Марину Бей. Обязательно! 
Отель комфортный, расположение отличное- пешком хоть куда, очень кстати бассейн- и для ранних пташек, и после прогулок! Завтрак достаточный, адаптирован и для европейцев, и для азиатов, фреши, кофе приличный (иногда нужно довольно долго ждать).
negative: При наличии готовых номеров за более ранее заселение попросили доплату, просили вторую дополнительную кровать- обещали, но не предоставили, мы обошлись. Однако при чек ауте- включили в счёт и потребовалось довольно много времени, чтобы прояснить ситуацию.

title: Exceptional
positive: Lage ist wirklich gut, fußläufig vieles gut zu erreichen.

title: Good club lounge benefits.
positive: Within walking distance to Gardens By The Bay,  Marina Bay Sands and Raffles. The club lounge benefits were very good, as were the views from there.
negative: Our room was a very drab beige/brown. In the corridors outside, the ceilings are very low on each floor, very claustrophobic and hot, even with the atrium. Our room needed a revamp. The turquoise/blue shades in the club lounge were much more cheerful.  Took a long time to get a lift.  We stayed in a hotel in the Clarke Quay area before this one.  It was almost half the price but the standard was every bit as good, as were the club lounge benefits.   It is probably the location that ups the price.  Expected to be taken to the club lounge floor for check in.  Also thought we’d have been on a higher floor.

title: Exceptional
positive: Beautiful clean property. Great views of the bay. Great shower!!!   Nice dessert as gift for our anniversary

title: Quite unexpected
positive: Good pool facilities and sun beds, clean corridors.
negative:
There were a lot of problems during our stay, which were quite unexpected:
- room was not available even though we made a booking
- had to queue for an extended period of time to get a replacement room
- ushers were not very helpful when approached to ask about queue number. Staff was dismissive and did not bother to help
- replacement room was dusty and had a musty smell
- had to call twice for housekeeping, which took a long time to come
- room was still dusty after vacuuming. Room seemed to be underprepared for stays
Duty manager was great and responded well with a follow up email and call, kudos to that. The above shouldn’t even have happened in the first place still. Would like to give pan pac a shot again in the future, but a lot more can be done

title: Definitely a good staycation

negative: The water in the shower room drains very slowly.

The amenities in room are not ready as well, the room is for 3 people, which also stated beforehand since booking, but they provided just for 2 lead us to ask for another set of everything and still took time too much. The cleaning of bedsheet is a bit terrific as there is blood stain on it.

Room:

Previous guest in bathtub and shower.

Hotel:

positive:
ロケーション、部屋の清掃、ランドリーサービス、職員の対応などとても良かった。少し込み入った会話をしたい時、日本人スタッフがいたことが心強かった。
いろいろなところへ観光のため移動するのに移動しやすい位置にあった。
朝はマリーナベイをジョギングしとても気分が良かった。

title: Pan Pacific  doesn't  disappoint  !!!
positive: Everything.  We hadn't  been  back for a few years. Everything was great. The bed was comfortable, the rooms were clean and spacious. We stayed in the Club  Rooms and it was well worth the money.
negative: Absolutely  nothing. Couldn't  fault  the Pan Pacific.

title: Wonderful
positive: No breakfast taken.  Good location, station nearby.
negative: Very strange building, a triangular building Though the size of the room is great, but in the middle of one side, had to walk a long way to the lift..

title: Exceptional

title: Great! Will recommend the hotel to anyone.
positive: The check-in experience was the best.  I failed to write down the name of the person who checked us in, but she was very nice. Everyone was friendly. Restaurants and shops around the hotel were fantastic.
negative: Not a huge problem, but even though there were several elevators, we had to wait a while.

title: Really exceeded my expectations of comfort.
positive: Best complimentary breakfast buffet. Love the bright & open corridors to our room. Staff respected privacy mode and helpful to get us kids slippers and step stool.
negative: Would be even better if there was complimentary club access or refreshments due to the high price of fireworks view room we paid during new year peak period. Edge restaurant tableware were visibly dirty too.

title: Excellent Property - we will stay again when in Singapore
positive: The selections at the "Edge" were very adequate,  however,  the same dishes were served every day.  It would have been nice if there were a rotation of different selections each day.
negative: We stayed at the Pan Pacific for 6 nights,  there was no set schedule for our room cleaning.   There were several times,  where we had to call housekeeping to send a person to clean our room.  However, this was done very promptly by housekeeping.

title: Exceptional
positive: Location, amenities, staff.

title: A great hotel
positive: Booking.com gave me a better rate than being a Discovery member!

title: Overall great value
positive: The breakfast was wonderful and the staff were very friendly and accommodating.
negative: Air in the room felt smoky. We asked if the room was non-smoking (the staff confirmed), but perhaps the prior guests did smoke. In any case, it took a while for the smell to dissipate.

title: Good
positive: Edge restaurant is amazing .

positive: My rooms were upgraded to a higher floors with a minimal extra fees.

negative: One female at the Concierge desk was a bit abrupt when asked a question.  On Nov. 20th & 21st, the service on the 38th floor was not as prompt as the two prior days.  After waiting 5 minutes, I found a staff member to order our drinks.

title: Exceptional
positive: The room was wonderful. Clean with plenty of storage area. We had a room with a balcony and the view was amazing.
negative: Nothing to report

had almost every possible ammenity

positive: The staff was friendly and accommodating. The rooms and hotel was clean. The location was excellent. The hotel had to switch our rooms during the middle of the stay because of a leak. Because of the inconvenience, they paid for our dinner at the hotel buffet dinner for one night.
negative: It didn’t have a sauna or steam room. The bathrooms were a bit dated.

title: Exceptional
positive: Great location and very good service. I love the TV Channel with cartoons which kept my child entertained while I took care of my business. I also enjoyed the balcony with a nice city view. The hotel is next to a couple malls, so there are tons of entertainment and food options.

どのホテルにもあると思っていた客室備え付けのスマートフォンが無く、外出時など不便でした。

title: Urlaub im Pan Pacific
positive:
Pan Pacific Club empfehlenswert! Frühstück - angenehm nicht so viel los wie unten und trotzdem einiges vorhanden! 
„Normales Frühstück“ im Restaurant - RIESEN Auswahl!!! 
(Club) Abend‘snack‘ (18-20 Uhr) mit Getränken auch empfehlenswert - Cocktails schmecken super! 
Personal freundlich und hilfsbereit! 
Essen am Pool sowie Cocktails ebenfalls sehr gut! 
ACHTUNG für Pan Pacific Club lange Hosen mitnehmen! Abends ausschließlich lange Hosen / lange Kleider erlaubt!! 
 
unser Zimmer war im letzten Stock - top Aussicht! Alles vorhanden! Alkoholfreie Getränke aus Minibar gratis (club) ...leider hatte es auf Grund der Luftfeuchtigkeit einen etwas feuchten Geruch im Zimmer (auch mit Klima nicht zu ändern) - Zimmer wurde für uns neu gemacht als wir das am nächsten Morgen mitteilten und Entfeuchter aufgestellt - leider hat es nicht viel gebracht - hätten auch Zimmer wechseln dürfen! Personal war stets freundlich!

title: このホテルを選んでよかったです。
positive:
どこにアクセスするにも本当に便利な場所にあり、観光にもちょっとした買い物にも、とにかくどこへでもとても行きやすかったです。
部屋からは、シンガポールフライヤー、ベイサンズホテル、マーライオンが見え、これぞシンガポールに来た！！と、思い出に残る眺めでした。
また、ホテル内はとても清潔で、見た目の清潔さだけでなく、とても掃除が行き届いていました。
息子がハウスダストアレルギー持ちのため、掃除の行き届いていないホテルへ行くとすぐに鼻の調子が悪くなるのですが、今回それが全くなく、とても快適に過ごすことが出来ました。
チェックアウト後にランチビュッフェを利用しましたが、料理の種類も豊富で、どれもとても美味しく、テーブルを回るスタッフの印象がとても良かったです。
今回は2泊で初めてのシンガポールということで、ほぼ観光でとてもバタバタしてしまい、ホテル自体を楽しむ時間が少なく、勿体ないことをしたと思いました。
次回はもっとゆっくりとホテルステイも楽しみたい！と思える、素敵なホテルでした。
ありがとうございました。
negative: 良くない点は特に見当たりませんでしたが、あえて言うなら、2階のエレベーター乗り場の階数表示が、どの階へ行けるエレベーターなのか、初見では混乱しました。上層階へ行くには、一度下に降りるの…？と思ってしまいました。一度乗ればそうでないとわかるので、大きな問題はなかったです。

The hotel is way too full and you always have to wait to be seated for breakfast and again after at the buffet if you want to get an omelette.

title: Disappointed Newlyweds
positive:
Nice room
Great view
negative:
I booked and paid in advance for the room on booking.com for my daughter and new husband for the wedding night. I sent a request via Booking.com to the hotel to request the room to have some decorations like flower petals in the room. This message was acknowledged by the hotel who said they would prepare the room for the newly wed couple. 
Not only was the room not decorated in any special way, the hotel charged my daughter again on checkin saying they needed the same credit card as the one used for booking. This, despite the payment having gone through on my credit card several days before. 
Very disappointing service.

title: Don’t trust the photos
positive: The view over Marina Bay was very nice. Breakfast was an amazing buffet
negative: We booked the Pacific Harbour Studio room (which I’ve stayed in before so we decided to book it again this time), but the room we got this time was COMPLETELY different, not like what was shown on the website either. We spoke with the staff, told us this is their new type, which I found quite deceiving when its not what the website shows. We requested for the one that I stayed in before, the one as shown on the website, but its actually full and only available the next day. Ok, so we waited until the next day to change our room.  3pm is the hotel’s check-in time so I expected this room to be ready! But no, turned out something was wrong with the tub and fixing.... so we waited and waited... 2hrs passed, still not fixed!!! “Luckily” another guest checked out and we finally got the room type requested.  But the plans for the rest of the night were all changed because of this, my kids were all crazy during the 2hrs wait.... and we were not a bit compensated

positive: The city suite exceeded expectations. It was big and exactly what I needed. It had coffee and a lot of seating. Great views and very clean with fresh flowers. They have me fruit. Nice touch
negative:
Check out and in was very slow and I got there at 430pm and had to wait. They gave me a lounge but I had a business meeting.
I got the city suite and the hair dryer was a low wattage one attached to the wall. Other high end hotels give you an actual blow dryer I have long hair and the hair dryer over heated and I had to go to a meeting. They got me a new hair dryer,  proper one but it would've been nice to have a better in this kind of hotel.
The service at the pool at night was slow and I couldn't find staff to pay. When I did he was kind but it was just not adequate
They made up for a lot of things when mistakes, but a lot of mistakes for this high end of a hotel

title: Fantastic, until we had to have words with the manager, which took the edge of our stay.
positive: Breakfast excellent, good choices. Room delightful, and view from it exceptional.  Glass Lifts outside of building.
negative: We were there for one night only celebrating our wedding anniversary and the hotel presented us with edible eats and fruit, on the day we vacated and straight after our breakfast! Needless to say we were not able to eat at that time after eating a large breakfast , so asked they be kept for our return later in the day, we were told that would be possible. On our return we were told they had not kept the food. We requested to speak to manager who sorted this for us. In our opinion the treats should have been presented to us on our arrival.  They had been notified we were celebrating, if they wanted to treat us they should do it properly or not at all. This situation should not occur in a hotel of this quality.

negative:

The bathtub also clogged up after one use and we were unable to use it the next day. 
We did not appreciate having to pay for additional bottles of water.

title: Good
positive: Located in the heart of shopping malls. Facilities were family friendly.
negative: The cleanliness could have been better.

title: Not so worth the price
positive: The location was good, we got high floors & room was comfortable.
negative:
We stayed for 3 days and 2 night. On the 2nd day, we went out expecting the room to be cleaned once we were out, however the room wasn't clean. They only provided small bins for us to throw our litters & that bin was not cleared as well. So we basically came back to a not made up room and since we went back quite late, we decided not to call to make up the room.
We also called the front desk to ask for a bucket of ice, however it was verbalised that we have to pay $5 for that unless we went down to the reception area to take it ourselves & then only it will be free. A bit ridiculous, bt okayy Pan Pacific. My first stay there, & i think gonna be my last.

title: Lacklustre
positive: Great location. Request for housekeeping was quite prompt. Skyline suite has a great view and the room size is quite value for money for the price.
negative: Maybe it's the new covid-19 normal where understaffing have caused a lot of problems, but having booked the skyline suite, it's quite unfathomable that there isn't any cutlery available at all in the room, neither can it be delivered to your room at all unless you order in-room dining. If you want cutlery, you have to take it yourself at the Pacific Marketplace. Can't the disposable cutlery packs be placed in the more premium rooms and suites? Some basic forks, knives and spoons and all? Same for ice. If you want ice, you get it yourself from level 1 (bit of a drag when you're at level 30), or pay $5 for it to be sent to your room. Just for ice! 5-star hotel and you have to carry a bucket of ice from the first floor to the 30th floor. For a suite, the amenities and facilities are lacklustre and not well-maintained: JBL speaker in the room malfunctioned after one day. Tap in the small bathroom leaked non-stop (faulty amenities like leaky taps are a major cause of water wastage). The fridge is TINY. If you want to chill bottles of sparkling water and wine it's gonna be a struggle. There was a small piece of something on the bathroom stall that remained there FOR 3 DAYS, and because I had some groundnuts, there were some debris on the carpet WHICH WERE STILL THERE THE NEXT DAY even after the room had been made up, it had not been vacuumed. The houskeeping really isn't thorough at all. I think the housekeeping is the part I'm the least happy with. I can understand about the ice and the cutlery due to covid-19 but housekeeping and cleanliness is indeed a basic part of a hotel stay isn't it.

title: Disappointing
positive:
Facilities were good, mostly clean and comfortable 
The bed was comfy and the pillows plush. Having a selection of nespresso coffee pods to have in the morning was definitely enjoyable.
Blackout curtains did a fantastic job at blocking out the light for a good sleep.
negative:
Chair was dusty (I had to clean it off with one of the towels)
While understandable that it might be protocol to not make up the rooms during these Covid times, it was unacceptable that calling to request for to tidy the room was not heeded (even after confirmation) and was only done after I had to make a fuss about it.

title: Unpleasant experience.
negative: Poor service, which could not keep up with the demand. I had to unload my own luggage from the car. Furthermore, check in took 30 min. I was told to go down and get my own utensils from my room. If not I would be charged $10 per trip for service. When I ordered room service, the food was just left at the door. I had to push in the food myself, set up the table myself and take out the food from the warmer myself. Coffee machine was not in the room, as I was told it is not included in my package. Minutes later, they brought it to my room as it was actually apart of my package. Extremely slow response to call operator, avg 3 - 5 min wait. Coming from a 5 star hotel point of view. I would never go back. Staff all gave different reasons for the same issue. It seems that the management has no clear SOP. I wanted to go to the pool side with my family for a walk at 8pm, and it was closed, when it was stated that its open till 1030pm.
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: Poor check-in process: standing nightmare
positive:
I love everything about the property. 
The facilities, the locations and the (after check in) service by the staff. 
It was easy to requests for missing items and staff are always friendly and polite. 
Rooms are also clean, even tho we found one baby roach scurrying in a corner but i guess it was okay. 
Bathrooms are also great, squeaky clean & toilet is equipped with bidet (yay to hygiene!!!)
Location was great, in the midst of shopping complexes and hence plenty of food options in case one gets hungry at different timings of the day.
negative:
The check-in process. 
Hotel shld hv pre-empted themselves with the influx of local staycationers. Hotel explained that the check-in process was longer than usual due to covid safe management measures but the crowd they had at the lobby defies all measures. 
It was a ‘party’ for covid virus if there was any among us. 
My family started queueing at 3pm and only were checked-in at 5-ish that laye afternoon, having to settle for another room as our requested room wasnt ready (despite being given a checked-in timeslot of 3.30pm).
Feel that there was absolutely a lack of pre-emptive planning and communications with the guests. What more, safe-distancing measures. 
All of these could be avoided with a pre-checked-in email and data collation prior to the stay. Or perhaps staggered check-in timings? 
I guess the pandemic may have caused the hotel to forget how to best serve their guests since there were relatively lesser prior to the hols. 
Although the stay was a wonderful experience, it was marred by the unpleasant ‘first-encounter’ at the check-in counter. 
Thanks.

title: Very Poor
negative:
Terrible management. In the email they sent me, it stated that guests were to check in at different time slots and my slot was at 4.30pm. Turns out due to the miscommunication by their management, all the guests for that day all guest were told to check in at 4.30pm. On top of that there was an extremely poor management of the situation and social distancing rules were not enforced. There were no staff available to manage the queues and ensure that guests stood 1m apart.
Furthermore, I was assigned a twin bed room even when I booked a king bed room. This was on top of the fact that they still had king bed rooms available. I went to my room after receiving my keys only to realise that it was a twin bed room. Went back down to the reception to ask why this was the case and it turns out that they were trying to push out the twin rooms first even though there were still king bed rooms available. Had to request for a change but at least I managed to get the king bed room that I booked.

title: Could have been better

negative: Cockroaches found in toilet, and old furnishings. Hair dryer spoilt after 1 day usage.
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

negative:
Breakfast was dismal. Standard sets with egg variations. No option to only specific items instead of having to waste food.
Should have reduced number of bookings if they were unable to maintain standards due to added measures. E.g long queues at check in and hard to get in room service.

title: Good

negative: The waiting time, as I had to wait for more than 3 hours to register. After I came back to get the room keys at 9pm, the room is still not ready.

negative: Unfortunatly they had shut all the door besides two due to Covid-19, when we tried to enter the mall it didnt explain why it was locked until i went to reception and asked. They had placed a sign but it was facing outside not inside for the guests trying to get out. The lower floor exit was the only one open. This is my 7th stay at this hotel, have always loved the hotel but felt this time it was started to look a bit dated and the rooms needed some change.
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: Good

negative: The service provided in the restaurant,  food quality and quantity can be improved

title: Conveniently Located Hotel in Town

negative: Cigarette smoke

title: we have upgraded our room to executive room and the stayed for a week
positive: housekeeping staff was absolutely fantastic, the room was sparkling clean at all times
negative: there's really nothing much in the hotel except for one swimming pool. May be some spa and sauna would have been nice

title: Nice rooms. Shame about the racism, rudeness, hostility, indifference and violent behaviour.
positive:
I came to the Pan Pacific 3 days after being in a car accident which took the life of a close relative. I suffered serious trauma to my face and head. I was  in Singapore to get medical clearance from a brain trauma expert to fly to my relative's funeral in Canada.
The early morning (6am) reception staff were OUTSTANDING . They allowed me to check in early and found me a room to allow me to be comfortable.
negative:
The staff at the lobby bar were not so good. Even though I had given my room number, and had left my laptop at the table, a (korean) staff member ran after me when I tried to go to the restroom. She accused me of trying to leave without paying , even though I was headed away from the exit . I don't know if it was my ethnicity (Indian) or the fact that I loooked like I had lost a boxing match, it was clear that she was only motivated my appearance. The aggressiveness of her behaviour suggested that she had been trained to behave in this manner towards people who looked like me.
Upon checkout,I once again experienced this contemptuous hostility with the lady at the reception. She kept cutting me off and raising her tone in a very dismissive manner. When She was tagging my baggage which I wanted to leave in storage for a few hours, she handed me my ticket. I waited to ensure that she put the other half of the ticket in my suitcase (I was going to take 3 flights in the next day and a half and did not want to risk any slip-ups with my left luggage). She stared at me pointedly with an expression of  irritation and literally "shoo'ed" me waving the back of my hand like one might do to an animal or a beggar on the street. Again this seemed to be normal behaviour to her, at least towards people who looked like me.
Finally when I came to pick up my bag, the porter said he could not find it and that I was not allowed to go inside to identify my bag. When I asked him what he proposed to about it he just shrugged.  When I entered the forbidden zone and pointed out my bags he slammed them into the taxi boot so violently and angrily that the driver came out to see if there was damage to the car!!
It's clear that at the Pan Pacific one is given treatment based one's appearance. If your can elicit pity or favourable racial/socio-economic bias, you will be treated kindly & respectfully.

title: All other things (room, location hotel) was good. But had a bitter experience while checkin.
positive: Breakfast was good
negative: I didnt liked Checkin process. I have many time requested for early checkin as i was travelling with my infant baby. Even though my requested room was ready (which they gave to another person) and asked me to wait for 3~4 hours. After that they only offered another room with extra charge of SGD70 per day. Same way they have done with my 2 other friend's (since i booked total 3 rooms) with extra charge of SGD50 per day. Dont you think this is abnormal and they just want to make money?

title: Good

title: We will not go there anymore
positive: Location. Facilities are very good.
negative:
We booked the hotel in March for a 5-day stay 10 months later. We were asked to provide arrival times at the airport, what we did. We then arrived at 9pm, as announced and had to learn that our room was not ready yet!!!!!!! We then were informed that they found a room which was ready. It was room #3209, the last room in a row, directly next to the staff/service elevator and staff facilities of that floor and therefore noisy. In addition, the room is probably the smallest of all rooms on the floor (ca. 1.5m shorter versus the other rooms on the floor...). Therefore, the bathroom was small for two people. In addition, the aircondition could not be turned down to acceptable blowing levels. We had to turn it off a lot to "survive" in the room. 
The hairdryer was not blowing hot air, only room temperature...
We mentioned all of this to the receiption and all we got was a "sorry"...
The late check-out extension to 6pm (from 12 noon) did cost us S$ 200; a rip-off.

negative: There was an inconsistency of information given. The room was not thoroughly cleaned, there were buttons and leftovers below the tv console. This was a concern for me as I was with my toddler.

title: Unpleasant.
positive:
We loved the spacious room and balcony overlooking Marina Bay and of course the excellent location . I had booked my preference bed and room for the max occupancy - all went well. 
Thank you to Eric, Jimmy, Charles, Mr Amin, Ms Yiling.
negative:
However, Pan Pacific Hotel overall service was just basic in accommodating the guests needs but not exceeding the guests expectations. I had gave my suggestions to them separately and it would be wonderful if Pan Pacific hotel could create and enhance their customers experience instead. Also, excellent service is now expected every where, so it is about time that hotels should level up their games (in competitions). 
- check-in at 3pm and there was long queues at both registration counters 
- Customer Service Eric was there to help ushering the guests to the next available counter. He should ask the guest in the queue instead if they need help in any ways. This is because I was in the queue alone while the rest of my family members were seating at the couch. After 10-15mins, I had to approach Eric for a priority queue cos I have an elderly pax and require a wheelchair (70 years old). He acknowledged and usher me to the next available counter. Thank you Eric.  
- the lobby staff were not proactive to "offer assistance" for luggage carrying and pushing the wheelchair. Basically, it was all about self-service I guessed. I dont feel like I/we were the guest(s) and/or they dont feel like treating the locals as one.
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: High expectations but disappointed.
positive:
We liked the proximity to Marina Bay Sands and many shopping centres in the area.
Edge buffet has a great selection and should satisfy most tastes.
negative:
Overall, there needs to be less emphasis on hotel profits and more on guest happiness.
Following check-in, we were desperate to shower because we had been in transit for 24 hours. We unpacked, showered and changed, then
checked for some milk to make a coffee. After finding a half drunk iced tea in the fridge, we called guest services to find out whether our
room had been cleaned. They sent a staff member up who scoffed at throwing the half drunk item away. We could have thrown it away
ourselves but we wanted to know that the room had been thoroughly cleaned prior to our arrival. This isn’t a cheap hotel and cleanliness
should go without saying. They said it had been cleaned and I think it had been done, just not thoroughly because I also found part of a
painted toe-nail on the floor of the toilet area.
Room service was ordered at 9pm and didn’t arrive until 10pm - the chicken wings were warm and the chips (‘truffle fries’) were cold.
Not to mention, the fries were $18! Truly, that’s extortion! There were only enough chips to cover around one large potato with finely grated
Parmesan cheese over the top! We called to advise about the cold chips and the hotel did offer to bring a replacement but we were very
hungry and didn’t want to wait another hour. The hotel did remove the charge off our account which was appreciated but if the service staff
cared to do so, they could easily check the status of the food before delivery to the guest - it was easy to tell the chips were cold because
the plate was cold to touch.
After check out, we wanted to sit in one of the pods to wait for our taxi, but we were given clear instructions that we would have to move
away from the pod if they needed it for another party. To be clear, the pod wasn’t reserved, it’s just that we (a couple) weren’t going to be
ordering a lot of drinks so would have to move out if a bigger party came along (this particular pod had four individual chairs and a table).

title: Great Hotel with great location but very disappointing Club experience
positive: We have been staying at the PanPacific for many years. It has always been our hotel of choice. We returned after the couple of years od covid lockdown expecting the hotel to be the same as the pre-covid days. The hotel itself is the same and the Club suites are just as they used to be. The location of the hotel is still superb. The staff at the Club lounge (eg Shine, Macluther are still there and doing a wonderful job as they always have. A lovely group of professional and attendtive staff - who have become friends over the years). We stayed for 2 weeks. But the experience was very disappointing. The new management of the Hotel really does need to lift its game in the benefits it provides to guests paying for Club access, otherwise guests will find an alternative hotel that proves them with what they expext from a 5 star hotel.
negative: If you stay here for a day or 2 in a Club room it may be OK. But if you stay for 2 weeks then it is definitely a disappointing and underwhelming experience - unlike the pre-covid days. Managment really does need to sit up and pay attention to the expectations of guests who pay tens of thousands of dollars to stay in a Club suite and expect better than what they are currently getting. The problem is that no longer can you go to the Club and have a relaxed breakfast away from the hustle and bustle and screaming kids on the third floor. Then when you go to the Club for afternoon tea, the food never changes  - it is essentially the same every day. Doesn't take long to tire of it if you are there for an extended period. The same goes for evening canapes. Each night was essentially the same - a platter with the same food - some cherry tomatoes, some grapes, couple of pieces of cheap cheese and crackers, some olives, the same small pieces of cake and some fried chicken (sometimes alternated with some other hot dish) but essentially the same every night. And you can't choose your own food but have to take what is given = even if it is not what you want. This is so different to the pre-covid days when dishes changed daily - there was always a wonderful selection of cheese, fruits, bread, hot dishes and desserts. As it stands it is really not worth the cost of paying for Club priviliges when the food selection is so poor. We thought this may all be due to Covid - until I read a review of someone who stayed at the Intercontinental Robertson Quay at about the same time as we stayed at the Pan Pacific. They wrote: "We wanted a quiet, relaxing time and to be spoilt in the club. We have not been disappointed. This is our ninth night and every day the afternoon tea has been varied and delicious. The evening canape snacks have also changed nightly and are of a high standard." This is how it used to be at the Club the PanPacific.

positive: Spacious, bright, great breakfast

title: Good location, but let down by substandard service
positive: Location was fantastic. We walked around the Marina Bay area every night, surrounded by shopping centres.
negative: Service can be improved. Arrived hotel at 12pm. Reception only called us at 3.30pm for check in. She was also confused initially and only issued one set of keys. The door connecting my 2 rooms was not unlocked, room keys for one room could not work, and the safe in both rooms needed to be repaired. The next day, we requested for the rooms to be cleaned around noon but  this was not done when we returned at 2pm.

title: Not worth my money
negative: The other room was 3 hrs late , the blinds not functioning properly, the fridge had to be open by the technician and the room service was so slow ..

title: Fair
positive: The room was nice and comfy!
negative: Checking in took more than an hour. That aside, requests for plates / glasses were responded with “you can collect them on your own at level one”. I get that Covid may affect certain norms (though this is a first, haven’t experienced this at any other local hotels I’ve stayed at so far), but I seriously didn’t expect to have to self-service for a supposed five star hotel.

title: A good location however it doesn’t feel like a 5 star hotel
positive: It’s location and the air conditioning in the room was good
negative: There was no hair conditioner, hangers and the carpet wasn’t vacuumed properly.

title: Super comfy beds
positive:
Had 3 rooms in total.
Super comfy beds & pillows.
Room was spacious nice view.
Beautiful CNY theme decor.
negative:
Kids pool water was so cold. 
Long wait for check in but understandable since hotel is on high occupancy.

title: Great
positive: View and bathtub was great

title: Pleasant
positive: Location was great, and check-in/out was relatively smooth even though it was crowded. Room service was decent.
negative:
This might come across as nitpicky, but I kinda expected a little better for the price we were paying. There were no cutlery/dishes in the room... I'm guessing because of COVID. BUT they had glasses and tiny cups and a coffee maker (with no spoons to stir your coffee with). When we called and asked if we could get some plates and cutlery delivered to the room, they said we had to go downstairs and get them ourselves? We decided to ask them for an extra set of plates and cutlery when we ordered our room service, and they gave us like 1 small side plate. 
Also, while our Panoramic Room has huge windows, they offer a view right into.... the office building opposite the hotel. Seriously should've saved a few bucks and booked the deluxe room.

title: Overall the stay was fairly good, quality of food was a disappointment.
positive:
The room was comfortable & cosy.
Staff were friendly and helpful
negative:
Minibar was not top up as requested.
Food was not as good as before, quality was compromised.
Breakfast menu was limited

title: Great location, not responsive Helpdesk and Housekeeper
positive: The hotel is near several shopping malls and can reach other city areas in less than 15 minutes via taxi.
negative: The Service One (Helpdesk) is neither intuitive nor responsive. We tried to call it 4 times before stopping. When we met a housekeeper outside our room, we asked her help to request room make-up on our behalf, but she insisted that we should make a call to the Helpdesk ourselves. In the end, we had to go down to lobby to request for it from the check-in counter area.

title: Human touch is vital in delivering a top notch experience.
positive: The dining experience at Hai Tien Lou was good.
negative: Staff’s attitude during check in was rather poor.
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: Disappointed, way below our expectations.
positive: Good location, conveniently located and linked to Marina Square which is very accessible. Shuttle bus provided but we did not utilize.
negative: Need to pay S$5 to replenish coffee and shaver(not provided). There is a old wood or moldy smell upon entering the room and throughout the stay. We felt with the price we paid without breakfast, we could have get a better deal, standard, service some where else. It is not worth the stay, will not come back again.
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: no longer the same as the past before pandemic, but good if you dont mind the breakfast.
positive: nice balcony, nice bed. bathroom toiletries are sufficient.
negative:
the swimming pool access- since we have paid so much for the room, its only understandable to allow for guests to consume their own drinks and not insist that no other beverages be allowed. we have not encountered such issue with other hotels and it almost seems hotel is so calculative that we consume our own drinks.
breakfast is disappointing. yes no buffet option where u can freely take your own food due to the pandemic but doesn't mean that the options should be limited to guests where most of them might actually be paying for your room and expecting a good breakfast. its also quite wasteful to be providing a plate of food and have people not finishing it cause they dont like some of the food offered in the plate. might as well just provide eg. scrambled eggs, and not like scrambled eggs breakfast platter right?
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: Disappointing for the price
positive: The room was clean, the bed was comfortable and the view was good as we got the Pacific Harbour Room which faces the bay
negative: The staff did not seem to cope. Particularly in the club lounge where half the time my glass was empty and I had to scout the room to look for a staff. The quality of the canapés were very disappointing for a 5-star hotel. I’ve tried several club lounges in Singapore and I must say I found this one the most disappointing, especially for the price. The pastries and cake were dry and had a store-bought quality - yes the sort you get in an economy mart, very unexpected for Pan Pac. This is my first time staying at the Pan Pac, and I really wish I had left with a better impression.

title: Basic
positive: Ala-carte spread was satisfactory.
negative:
However room service was under par as they don't provide daily change. Our room had no amenities (coffee, tea cups for coffee, plates for snacks) at all. Apparently they will charge for delivery for plates 😱
No hair conditioner and no change of towels daily.
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: It was overall good.
positive: The personal touches of the property and room cleanliness.
negative: The check in time, however we understand that given the restrictions and safety measures, however the timing to check in was at 5pm.

title: had nice view. able to see mbs, esplanade, fullerton and raffles place from the hotel room.
positive: bed were comfy, nice view
negative: swimming pool too small, no steam room or jacuzzi
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: Skip the breakfast! Walk out to the malls for better eats.
positive: Nice friendly staff. Special praise goes to Ms Aziana who was proactive in helping me to retrieve the camera I accidentally left behind in the room after we’ve checked out and Mr Jun Hui who nicely accepted my feedback about the spoiled BD surprise and waived the 2nd day’s breakfast which I skipped. Oh my kids 2&5 yos love the pool too.
negative: Nothing much except for the so-so breakfast and the fact that a normally 300+ room cost almost double the price when booked through booking.com during the festive seasons. Or let’s say for that price I thought I was getting the premium pacific harbour studio room with club floor access but I was mistaken.

title: Not value for money. Very good breakfast? (As stated) Certainly not.
positive:
Location
Allows early check in
Accessibility to malls
Well decorated main lobby 
Efficient COVID measurements 
Helpful front line staff 
Free parking coupon
negative:
Room is Smaller than expected (booked and paid for 3 adults)
Worn looking
Not so inviting balcony with 2 old chairs and stained coffee table. 
2 single beds almost occupied the entire bedroom. Barely any room to accommodate the Third bed.
Missing amenities for 3 pax. 
Called room service to check.
Room service came while we were out.
Still, there were missing items. Not critical, so didn’t bother to ask again.
The toilet bowl was stained. 
Bathroom rug was thin. 
Hand, face and bath towels - doesn’t feel luxurious and fluffy soft. But clean, coz it smelled of Chlorine.  
Not a space to enjoy a shower for sure.
Bathroom amenities could pass for 3 or maybe reluctantly a 4-star hotel. Felt utterly sad for a Pan Pacific.
The hair dryer- powerful if matched w the noise level when used. Almost deafening. 
A very good breakfast??
I couldn’t have imagined anything worse.
Asked for hot milk. Not available.
Only serve apple/orange juice, tea/coffee.
Very limited choice of breakfast sets.
Not tasty at all.
I’m speechless. A 5-star hotel Breakfast, seriously?
Apart from the good points mentioned.
No worthwhile feel-good moments we could take away with us from this staycation at Pan Pacific.
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: Disappointing
positive: Location was perfect for foreign visitor
negative: Highly over rated and priced, not at all value for money. Hospitality And services are below average and for the price paid is not worth it at all. Location and view is great though.

title: The hotel was good, but the same services you may get in a cheaper hotel too.
positive: We were a group of three people who came for tourism in Singapore in mid-May. The hotel was great, the staff was also accommodating. They were readily available whenever we needed them. They were also able to provide us with a room 2 hours prior to the check-in time.  The hotel was nicely maintained and beautiful, there were top Singapore attractions within walking distance from the hotel. The beds were comfy and we had a good night's sleep.
negative: We did not find a bidet in the toilet written in the facilities during the booking. We also asked that we will have a single large bed and won't be needing another bed. But, hotel policy added that extra bed by default which we had to pay extra for. In my opinion, this should be optional and only be given to. the customers who explicitly request it. An extra bed was accommodated in a room for two guests so it became cluttered and became uncomfortable. Also, the toiletries, towels, slippers, coffee, tea, etc. all were provided two in number every day and we had to call for extra stuff every day. This could have been done automatically given that the staff knows that three people are staying in the room (3 beds are there in the room). By these standards, we felt that the hotel was pricey. Otherwise, the hotel was good.
room: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Balcony

title: Enjoyable for Children
positive: The kids playroom and pool were very nice and my daughter enjoyed them. I also liked that my room had a sofabed and there was a door separating the living room from the bedroom for privacy.
negative: You couldn't have tea service delivered to the room. I paid for the clubroom access but I didn't know kids would not be allowed after 6pm. I was traveling with my 3yr old daughter and I had to take turns with my helper to eat while she watched my daughter. The clubroom manager also saved my helper's leftovers until I arrived and would not replenish the items my helper ate because he said it was supposed to be a shared plate and he didn't want to waste the food she left. This was very surprising since there were other people that were leaving food on the plate which was wasteful. This was very cheap and tacky and in poor taste not to replenish my plate - knowing I had a daughter I could not bring into the club and was taking turns eating with my helper.

positive: easy access to shopping mall
negative: No USB port to charge in room, tap outlet too near to sink will definitely touch the sink when washing, room  not clean behind doors & TV console when we walk in, Take almost an hour to check in with no queue infront svs not acceptable, breakfast spread not appealing and worse is the service not up to standard even though staff wee courteous, ask for hot water & given a mug of hot water with coffee stains - brownish colour, ask for ketchup at egg counter was told to get from svs staff then staff told me cannot do for me I have to go ??? counter to take myself, ask to refill coffee & staff murmur something that I cannot understand as not proper English & she took my mug away & come back with coffee refiled but in my used coffee stained mug . I felt very uncomfortable when we ask for a few raw sugar & the staff came back with two handfuls of different type of sugar & trying to put in the tray but no space and guest around starting at our table wondering why we ask for that much of sugars, timing on clock at bedside not updated, alarm clock rang at 6.55am & 7.30am by itself when no one set any alarm, booked 25 hours but room cards was lock out at 12pm & have to get it reactivated. basically the check in staff & the restaurant staff not competent at their scope even on basic, the housekeeping staff try to make up to ask by giving us some water & coffee but what we need is a clean room when we checked. Also at breakfast the staff kept wanting to clear our plates a few times when we are not done with it.  No staff at breakfast entrance at around 8.45am have to wait for about 7mins. We initially booked a connecting room for twin beds but room not ready when we checking in at ard 3.05pm . In the end we only get our rooms at a lower floor and two separate by another room in between and have to bear with a king room & a twin room at 4pm.
room: 25-Hours Vacation - Deluxe King or Twin Room

positive: Big rooms, although a bit dated. I am pretty sure I remember that the TV cabinet is the same as it was 20+ years ago. All in all I would have thought they would have modernized it a bit more. Whereas this used to be a typical business hotel, it seems to be more of a family hotel now, with the pool full of kids over the weekend.
negative: The hotel was apparently suffering from lack of staff after re-opening after Covid lockdown. Room was not cleaned on daily basis, only towels replaced. That is not the service you expect to receive in a 5-star hotel. Most annoying though is that we were not informed of their service procedures at checkin so the lack of room cleaning in the first few days was a huge annoyance.

title: terrible
positive: property was convenient however service was terrible.

delays for room service, make up room, request for ice cubes. 
in total I had to wait for 1-2 hours after each call. 
booked the room for my wife’s birthday. was told that they’d decorate the room. however when I went in, nothing was done. I even called to check. still no one came to do anything. terrible experience for such a high costing room.

title: Average experience
positive: Location and pool are really good
negative: There are no tea and coffee facilities in the rooms or mini bar even with soft drinks. Nothing opens before 11am even if you want to get a take away coffee. They also called me incessantly to put more $$ on the credit card deposit as our incidentals had gone above the limit - the first time this has ever happened during a hotel stay personally. It’s like they didn’t trust you would pay your bills. I ended up paying for everything prior to the day we checked out. The service was quite slow overall too.

title: Mehh. Service could have been better.
positive: Staff were friendly.
negative:
- Stayed 3d2n to celebrate my 1 year Anniversary and also indicated under the remark section. Afterwards hotel crew mentioned that quoted "We are delighted to learn that you are coming to celebrate anniversary for this trip, in celebration of this, we will be providing special amenities during your stay with us." 
Upon checking in, we did not receive anything and I clarified with the same crew who sent me that email. She then informed me that we'll be receiving assorted sweets and it will be sent to us before we check out. Long story short, we received a box with 3 types of delicacies, 2 of each (kueh lapis, swiss roll and overturn messy macaroons). With the same price I spent for my trip, I knew we could have receive better services elsewhere. 
- Minibar was not cold at all. Switch it on & off a couple of times but still doesn't work. 
- Room wasn't thoroughly cleaned and checked prior. 
- Took room service approximately 30 min to deliver out cutleries.
